dumbAttackPack:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
dumbAttackPack:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

dumbAttackPack:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
dumbAttackPack:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
dumbAttackPack:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

dumbAttackPack:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
dumbAttackPack:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

dumbAttackPack:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
dumbAttackPack:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !dumbAttackPack:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

dumbAttackPack:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
dumbAttackPack:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !dumbAttackPack:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
